front.title: RSVP-TE Extensions in Support of Impairment Aware Routing and Wavelength Assignment in Wavelength Switched Optical Networks (WSONs)

abstract.t: This document provides RSVP-TE extensions to support Generalized Multi-Protocol Label Switching (GMPLS) control of Impairment Aware Routing and Wavelength Assignment in Wavelength Switched Optical Networks (WSONs).
